did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Ledgers maintained by William T. Munsey, proprietor of a general mercantile store in Giles County, Virginia, during the early 20th century.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from the William T. Munsey Account Books must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: William T. Munsey Account Books, Ms1940-025, Special Collections, Virginia Tech, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The William T. Munsey Account Books were acquired by Special Collections prior to 1941.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the William T. Munsey Account Books commenced and was completed in August, 2013.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: William Tunis Munsey, son of Jacob and Margaret Jane Henderson Munsey, was born in Giles County, Virginia in December 1867. He married Blanche S. Burton (1880-1954), and the couple would have three children. Munsey seems to have remained all his life in the community of Bane (Giles County), where he farmed and operated a general store. William Munsey died in Giles County in 1946, and was buried in Munsey Cemetery.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: This collection contains ledgers maintained by William T. Munsey, proprietor of a general mercantile business in Giles County, Virginia, during the early 20th century. Included are account ledgers and day books detailing customer account transactions. Entries include customer names, dates of transactions, goods, purchased, and amounts paid. The collection also contains records of the store's cash and bank transactions.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by ledger type, then chronologically.
